official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain alloyed steel bars.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, for a ten-year period, the duty on certain flat steel bars.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain alloyed steel bars.
